profile:
Our Company
We at Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. are passionate about the work we do. Our commitment is to work with our clients to provide the best and most effective solution to complete the project in a safe and timely manner. We are dedicated to providing our clients a high level of customer satisfaction and accurate professional advice.
 
Our Health and Safety Policy
Our policy at Canturk Paving and General Contracting Ltd. is to provide and maintain a safe and healthy working environment. Compliance with Health and Safety regulations are outlined in the Health and Safety Policy of Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. Our employees are trained yearly and certified to ensure in reducing the risk of injuries in the workplace by following our policy.
 
Our Guarantee
We Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. construct each project using the highest quality materials, while providing the highest level of expertise and customer service. Even though each project varies from client to client, we provide quality service no matter the size of the project. Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. offers a written gurantee of 12 months from the date of completion.
services:
Asphalt Paving Services
Canturk Contracting Ltd. constructs asphalt pavements for property owners who desire affordable and high quality paving materials. Asphalt is durable and weather resistant, assuring maintenance and repairs are minimal. Unlike other poured materials asphalt is easy to install, therefore saving you hundreds of dollars in labor costs.

Our professional team at Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. provide the following asphalt services:

Parking Lots
Driveways
Walkways
Resurfacing
Patching
Speed Bumps
Trenches
Seal Coating
Crack Filling
Catch Basins
Line Marking
********************************
CONCRETE 
Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. offers a wide variety of concrete services. We are trained and skilled in all aspects of concrete projects. Concrete is being one of the oldest and most commonly used construction materials which possess countless benefits, along with being durable and relatively low maintenance. Concrete is reliable and has a long lifespan.

Our professional team at Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. provide the following concrete services:

Regular Concrete
Pattern Concrete
Colour Concrete
Standard Curbs
French Curbs
Garage Floors
Garbage Pads
Jewel Stone
********************************
Interlock Paving Services
Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. specializes in designing and implementing interlocking stone. We can construct a wide variety of outdoor spaces, including but not limited to driveways. Interlocking can make any outdoor space aesthetically pleasing with great quality stones. We work with our clients to design their layout and are also available to assist with selection of products and other aspects of the project.

Our professional team at Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. provide the following interlock services:

Interlocking Stone
Interlocking Steps
Interlocking Porches
Retaining Walls
Stone Waterfalls
Natural Flagstone
Masonry Repairs
Driveways
Walkways
Patios
Outdoor Kitchens (BBQs)
Fireplaces

profile:
Welcome to the York Huron Paving Inc. service information page. We are the premier providers of Asphalt ,Interlocking Stone and Concrete work. Our goal is to provide you the very best in the paving industry starting from the planning stage to the finished product. Before we start, we know your job from start to finish. A thorough site inspection permits us to become familiar with the specific conditions of each individual project for a better layout and planning of the project.

When you receive an estimate from us you get more than just a price, you get professional advice, planning and design.   

Our quality control standards are high. Our personnel are among the best in the industry with over 25 years experience. Our goal is always to deliver satisfaction. Your satisfaction is of paramount importance which fuels in referrals and repeat customers. 

Below is a short list of the services we offer: 

Asphalt paving for;              Parking Lots

Residential and Rural Driveways, Tennis Courts & Golf Courses

                                       
Concrete;                        French Curbs, Parking Lot Curbs & Sidewalks, Concrete Patios & Driveways

Interlocking Stones for;         Driveways, Walkways and Patios

                                       Curbs , Retaining Walls & Steps.

Protect and improve your number one investment with Shield Kings, a trusted name in home renovation and restoration since 2004.  We have helped improve the homes of over a thousand satisfied clients. Our areas of expertise include basement finishing, washrooms, waterproofing and crack injections, driveway and asphalt sealing and many more. Life is too short to stress over renovations. Call or email us now for a hassle-free, no-obligation consultation.

services:
Home
Our Services

1.877.389.0043
Our Services
 

You don’t want to risk your home with inexperienced builders. With over ten years of experience in home improvement and restoration, Shield Kings brings you the best service at a reasonable price. Call us now for a free consultation for an ounce of early prevention could mean a pound of expensive reconstruction!





Home Renovations

 

Basement Finishing

 

Turn that dark room into a beautiful lounge area that you and your family will enjoy for years to come.

 

Washrooms

 

Remodel or rebuild your washroom with brand new materials to add comfort and style in your home.

 

Remodelling

 

We can do any home or garden remodelling from decks to landscaping.

Basement Waterproofing

 

Foundation Repairs

 

Your foundation wall needs extra care due to the pressures it handles from the outside elements and moisture.

 

Foundation Waterproofing

 

Keep everything protected and sealed through our meticulous sealing process to keep harmful moisture out.

 

Crack Injections

 

We seal all cracks to prevent any further damage, keeping your walls protected for all seasons.

Asphalt Sealing

 

Parking Lots

 

We will take care of your asphalt cracks with our clay-based sealer to prevent further damages. Service available for commercial areas.

 

Driveways

 

We keep your driveway protected and sealed through our meticulous process and clay-based sealer. Service available for commercial areas.

profile:
We offer: Concrete Coating, Asphalt Sealing & Epoxy Coating. Power washing services also available 

We also offer a premium crack filling service, stop using fillers, tar strips or rubberized epoxy materials that look awful and do nothing to fill those tedious cracks.

What we do when we arrive to your home or business for asphalt: Get rid of the weeds around the perimeter of the area, clear the area of any dirt, dust & debris, then seal. 

For Concrete: Clear the area of any dirt, dust & debris, power wash wait 24 hours to dry, then coat. 

Power washing services also available for both Asphalt & Concrete

profile:
ASPHALT - CONCRETE - INTERLOCK
King Star Paving Inc. is a family owned and operated company that has over 40 years of experience. We are a full service paving organization that prides ourselves on a philosophy of working coherently with each other in providing exceptional quality outputs that exceed every expectation. Our team has been involved in various types of asphalt paving, concrete and interlock projects. Our knowledge stems from working with private homeowners to having long standing relationships with some of Ontario's premier Homebuilders. King Star Paving skilled team of employees have completed numerous ICI (Industrial, Commercial, Institutional) undertakings which entailed asphalt paving, concrete curbs/walkways and interlock placement. The knowledge and experience we have gained over the years is what allows us to produce quality outputs on every job we are awarded.

An asphalt paving surface is the most economical solution of material that is used to provide a very clean, sleek look to any home or commercial property.  The curb appeal create enhances the value of your property while providing  durability and maintenance free living.

We at King Star Paving encompass a vast amount of  equipment and machinery to complete every driveway project with the right compaction and placement of asphalt.  The knowledge and expertise we hold enables every project to be completed correctly and efficiently leaving your driveway to last for years to come.
service_area: We service the GTA, Toronto, Halton, Durham & Niagara Regions.
services:
Asphalt driveway paving, parking lot paving.
Concrete curbs, french curbs, walkways and patios. 
Interlock boarders, driveways, walkways, patios.
